text: State Highway 4 (SH-4) connects Arcot with Villupuram. Total length of SH-4 is 114 km. ==SH-4 Route== Arcot -Thimiri -Arani - Chetput - Valathi - Gingee - Muttathur - Villupuram Road. *Villupuram Road refers to the junction of SH-4 with NH-45 near Villupuram (Katpadi Gate). *Katpadi Gate refers to crossing of Villupuram-Katpadi rail line on NH-45. ==External links== * Arcot-Villupuram State Highway Map Category:State highways in Tamil Nadu
title: State Highway 4 (Tamil Nadu)
